Welcome to ZeroRotate’s documentation!¶

ZeroRotate is an open-source PyTorch benchmark for performing scalable rotation detection on various datasets, which is maintained by Yue Zhou and Xue Yang with Shanghai Jiao Tong University supervised by Prof. Jiang Xue.
